hadiths.text: Narrated Um Salama:Once Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "You people present your cases to me and some of you may be more eloquent and persuasive in presenting their argument. So, if I give some one's right to another (wrongly) because of the latter's (tricky) presentation of the case, I am really giving him a piece of fire; so he should not take it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَقَامَ الْبَيِّنَةَ بَعْدَ الْيَمِينِ
chapter.eng-name: The proof after (the defendant) has taken the oath
